綯字的基本解释

綯
táo
见“绹”。

綯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［táo］
［《廣韻》徒刀切，平豪，定。］
“绹1”的繁体字。
绞制绳索。《诗·豳风·七月》：“晝爾于茅，宵爾索綯。”毛传：“綯，絞也。”郑玄笺：“夜作絞索，以待時用。”一说即绳索。陈奂传疏：“索者，糾繩之名，绹即繩也。索綯猶言糾繩。”

綯字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　綯； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页927第20
〔古文〕絝【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?徒刀切，音陶。【爾雅·釋言】綯，絞也。【註】糾絞繩索。【詩·豳風】宵爾索綯。【箋】夜作絞索，以待時用。　又【韻補】叶徒侯切。【楊方·合歡詩】衣用雙絲綫，寢共無縫綯。子靖我不動，子遊我無留。

綯字的源字形

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［táo］
["Guangyun" cuts with a knife, Pinghao, Ding. ]
Traditional characters for "绹1".
Twist the rope. "Poetry·Binfeng·July": "The day is on the mao, and the night is on the rope." Mao Chuan: "The rope, the twist." Zheng Xuanjian: "Make a noose at night to be used in time." One said it is a rope. . Chen Huan Chuan Shuo: "The roper, in the name of correcting the rope, 繹 is the rope. Suoqi still speaks of correcting the rope."
bind
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　綯; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 927 to 20
〔古文〕绔【广韵】【Jiyun】【Yunhui】【Zhengyun】? Cut with a knife, sound pottery. 【Erya·Interpretation】Ou, twisting. [Note] Twisted rope. 【Poetry·Binfeng】Xiaoer Suoqi. 【Jian】Make a noose at night for use in time.　[Rhyme Filling] Ye Tuhou cut. 【Yang Fang·Hehuan Poems】The clothes are made of double silk thread, and the bed is seamless. I won't move Zijing, I won't stay with Ziyou.
